name: CloudsDaily
0:
”Alexa ask clouds daily for latest updates”
”Alexa ask clouds daily for weekly updates”
”Alexa, ask clouds daily on the last two days of updates”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: clouds daily
des:
Keeping up with the latest updates on the ever-so-fast-growing cloud tech can be overwhelming! Here is the skill that'll help you find out about the latest updates published on cloud websites, such as AWS and others!
Disclaimer: Neither this skill nor the developer of the skill is affiliated with amazon in any way.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
